original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 302.00/40 to dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 302.00 /40 against the US dollar in the spot market on Thursday, while bond yields were down, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 26.55/65 percent steady from Wednesday’s close at 26.85/27.00 percent.
The Sri Lanka rupee closed stronger at 302.00/40 against the US dollar in the spot market on Thursday from its last close at 303.50/304.20 rupees. (Colombo/May24/2023)
